physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Axial lateralization to the left, significant painless asymmetry at the level of the shoulder girdle, symmetrical tone, volume, muscle mass, and strength. Bicipital and patellar reflexes were 2/4.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: One month post-surgery, the syringomyelic cavity reduced to 5 mm, but scoliotic posture persisted with a final angle of 31Â°.
